hero.title: Prepare Smarter. Live Better.
hero.subtitle: We bring Swiss quality and valuable free time back to your school day.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Sunday afternoons at your desk? Nights spent formatting worksheets? We believe: Great teaching doesn't mean sacrificing yourself.
mission.paragraph2: The demands on Swiss educators are constantly increasing. Individualization, digitalization, and administrative hurdles require time – time that's often missing in everyday life. This is exactly where EasyLehrer comes in.
mission.paragraph3: We see ourselves as your digital assistant. We bridge the gap between high didactic standards and limited preparation time. Our goal is to have your back, so you can invest your energy where it's needed most: with your students.

value1.title: Time Savings, Not Stress
value1.description: Our materials are ready to use immediately. Find, print, teach. Your evening belongs to you again.

value2.title: 100% Lehrplan 21
value2.description: No converting Euros to Francs or adapting content. Our materials are tailored specifically for Switzerland.

value3.title: Teacher-Verified
value3.description: We offer quality over quantity. Every material undergoes a quality check by experienced educators.

origin.title: From Practice, For Practice
origin.paragraph1: EasyLehrer is not an anonymous tech corporation. The platform emerged from a genuine need: colleagues were looking for a central hub for modern Swiss teaching materials, without having to wade through confusing databases.
origin.paragraph2: What started as a small exchange has become a growing community. We connect creativity with didactics and ensure that good work is fairly rewarded.

founders.title: Meet the Team
founders.subtitle: Two backgrounds, one mission: making teaching easier for Swiss educators.

founder1.name: [Founder Name]
founder1.bio: With a background in computer science, I bring the technical expertise to build a platform that's fast, reliable, and easy to use. My goal is to create tools that save teachers time, not add complexity.

founder2.name: [Founder Name]
founder2.bio: As an experienced educator, I understand firsthand the daily challenges teachers face. I ensure that everything we build is practical, pedagogically sound, and truly aligned with Swiss classroom needs.

founders.story: We started EasyLehrer because we saw how much time teachers spend on preparation — often at the expense of their own wellbeing. By combining tech and teaching expertise, we're building a platform that truly works for Swiss educators.
founders.highlight: Have questions or ideas? We'd love to hear from you.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: These Seller Terms govern your use of EasyLehrer as a seller of teaching materials. By accepting these terms and completing the seller onboarding process, you agree to be bound by these conditions.

platformFee.title: 2. Platform Fee
platformFee.content: EasyLehrer charges a platform fee of 30% on all sales. This means:

breakdown.platform: EasyLehrer retains 30% as a platform fee

details.schedule: Payouts are processed automatically on a rolling basis (typically 2-7 business days after a sale)

items.copyright: Copyrighted material you don't have rights to sell
items.plagiarized: Plagiarized or copied content from other sources

items.support: Responding to buyer questions about your materials

rights.remove: Remove content that violates these terms
rights.suspend: Suspend or terminate seller accounts for policy violations

cookiesPage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPage.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how EasyLehrer uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website. We are committed to transparency about the data we collect and how we use it.

what.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience. Cookies can be 'session' cookies (deleted when you close your browser) or 'persistent' cookies (remain until they expire or you delete them).

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.content: We use cookies to provide essential website functionality, remember your preferences (like language settings), keep you signed in, and understand how visitors use our platform so we can improve it.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, authentication, and accessibility. You cannot disable these cookies.

cookies.session: Keeps you signed in to your account
cookies.csrf: Protects against cross-site request forgery attacks

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve the website experience.
analytics.note: We currently do not use analytics cookies. If we add them in the future, they will only be activated with your explicit consent.

managing.title: 4. Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managing.content: When you first visit our website, you'll see a cookie consent banner where you can choose to accept all cookies or only essential cookies. You can change your preferences at any time by clearing your browser cookies and revisiting the site.
managing.browser: You can also manage cookies through your browser settings:

changes.title: 5. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legislation, or our data practices. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about EasyLehrer

q1.question: What is EasyLehrer?
q1.answer: EasyLehrer is a Swiss platform where teachers can buy and sell high-quality teaching materials. All materials are specifically designed for the Swiss Lehrplan 21 curriculum and created by experienced teachers.

q2.question: Who is EasyLehrer for?
q2.answer: EasyLehrer is aimed at all teachers in Switzerland - from primary to secondary level. Our materials are available for Cycle 1, 2, and 3 and cover all subject areas of the Lehrplan 21.

q3.question: Why EasyLehrer instead of other platforms?
q3.answer: EasyLehrer is 100% focused on Switzerland. All materials use Swiss spelling (ss instead of ß), are aligned with Lehrplan 21, and prices are in Swiss Francs. Additionally, our server is hosted in Switzerland.

q4.question: Do I need to create an account?
q4.answer: You don't need an account to browse and view material previews. However, a free registration is required to buy or sell materials.

q5.question: How can I contact support?
q5.answer: You can reach us via the contact form on our website or by email. We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

q1.question: What file formats are available?
q1.answer: Most materials are available as PDF and/or Word documents (DOCX). The exact format is indicated for each material. Word documents can be edited after download.

q2.question: Are the materials editable?
q2.answer: That depends on the file format. Word documents (DOCX) are fully editable. PDF files cannot be edited directly but are ideal for printing.

q3.question: Can I share materials with colleagues?
q3.answer: The license is valid for a single teacher. Sharing with colleagues or uploading to school networks is not permitted. For school licenses, please contact us directly.

q4.question: How does payment work?
q4.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), TWINT, and for schools also invoice with QR code. All prices are in Swiss Francs including VAT.

q5.question: Can I return materials?
q5.answer: Since these are digital products, returns are generally not possible after download. For technical problems or if the material doesn't match the description, please contact our support.

q1.question: How can I sell materials?
q1.answer: Register as a seller, connect your account with Stripe for payouts, and upload your materials. After a brief review, your materials will be published.

q2.question: What is the commission rate?
q2.answer: EasyLehrer keeps 30% of the sale price as a platform fee. You receive 70% of each sale directly to your bank account.

q3.question: When will I receive my payout?
q3.answer: Payouts are processed automatically via Stripe once your balance reaches CHF 50. The transfer to your bank account usually takes 2-3 business days.

q4.question: What are the requirements for materials?
q4.answer: Your materials must be original, consider the Lehrplan 21, and use Swiss spelling (ss instead of ß). Copyrighted content from third parties is not allowed.

q5.question: What does LP21-compliant mean?
q5.answer: LP21-compliant means your material is aligned with the competencies of the Lehrplan 21. When uploading, you can select the corresponding competency codes (e.g., MA.1.A.1).

q1.question: How do I download purchased materials?
q1.answer: After purchase, you'll find all acquired materials in your Library under 'My Account'. You can re-download the files there at any time.

q2.question: I'm having download problems. What should I do?
q2.answer: First try reloading the page or using a different browser. If the problem persists, please contact our support with your order number.

q3.question: Is my data secure?
q3.answer: Yes, we take data protection very seriously. Our servers are located in Switzerland, and we strictly comply with Swiss data protection law (nDSG) as well as GDPR. More details in our Privacy Policy.

q4.question: Which browsers are supported?
q4.answer: EasyLehrer works with all modern browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend always using the latest version of your browser.
